chart.name: chart.prof.per.sexe
chart.title: Les surveillants par sexe
chart.dataset:
SELECT Count(self.name) AS amount, _sexe.name AS sexeProf, _etablissement.name AS etablissement
FROM Prof self LEFT JOIN self.etablissement AS _etablissement LEFT JOIN self.sexe AS _sexe WHERE self.etablissement = :_etablissement AND self.fonctionExaman.code =1 GROUP BY _etablissement.name, _sexe.name
